teamGoalDescription: Achieve substantial completion 30 days ahead of contract date to allow for owner move-in preparation
liquidatedDamagesTerms: $5,000 per calendar day beyond substantial completion date

criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: 22-week lead time drives exterior enclosure milestone; delays cascade to interior finishes
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Weekly calls with manufacturer; early release of shop drawings for fabrication

criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: 14-week installation window required; state inspection backlog adding 3-4 weeks
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Pre-filed inspection request; consider third-party inspector option

criticalPathConcerns.description: Fire alarm system testing and acceptance
criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: Full building test required for TCO; 2-week testing window needed
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Phased testing approach to verify systems floor-by-floor

criticalPathConcerns.description: Permit processing for structural steel revisions
criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: Revised connection details require re-review; 3-week permit turnaround
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Expedited review request submitted; pre-construction meeting with building official

criticalPathConcerns.description: Underground utility relocation coordination with FPL
criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: FPL transformer relocation drives site work sequence
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: FPL completed relocation ahead of schedule on Dec 20

teamGoalDescription: Two-week early completion buffer for owner landscaping and furnishing

criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: 28-week lead time for impact-rated custom windows; must order by Feb 1
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Owner deposit received; shop drawings in final review

criticalPathConcerns.description: Pool construction sequencing with main structure
criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: Pool shell must be poured before backfill of rear foundation; 3-week window
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Pool sub mobilizing week of Feb 10; concrete schedule coordinated

criticalPathConcerns.description: Custom stone import from Italy for master bath and kitchen
criticalPathConcerns.impactDescription: 16-week fabrication and shipping; selection must be finalized by Feb 15
criticalPathConcerns.mitigationPlan: Owner visiting stone yard in Miami next week for final selection
